Articles.Content:
False, but two of my friends and a teacher have been.

The user below me will answer false and is not hawkinator

Tr...What?

The user below me has a lively social life.

Define social, What is this real life you speak of? (False?)

The user below has created an artificial moon

True, if you count the various differrent things I have put in orbit as moons.

The next user is sitting in a starbucks while browsing The Forum.

False.

The user below me is an extrovert.

False, sitting on the sofa and watching TV

The user below me is incorrect.

False, I am always right

The next user disagrees with this statement.

True, I agree that I disagree with your statement

The user below me is incorrect and not hawkinator

False, I am The Hawkinator!

The next user lives on the opposite side of the Atlantic from me.

Is Alpha Centauri on the other side of the Atlantic? False, I guess.

The user below me has never been to the Outer Planets (Jool, Eeloo or Dres)

False. Been to Jool and Dres.

The user below is a part purist.

True, I'm additive to the forums, especially the off topic forums.

The user below me has the same problem

Edit: You keep sniping me.

Not really...

The next user is not an alcohol addict. I'm not, by the way.

True, but does drinking isopropyl alcohol count?

The user below me drinks water.

True, i also drink beer, tea, coffee, wine, and once in a blue moon, soda.

The user below me has brown eyes.

True and False, they alternate between brown and green.

The user below me spends more time on the forums than playing KSP

True. As of the past weeks

User below spends more time playing KSP than visiting forums.

False. I don't play KSP as much as it is now.

The next user is not a purist.

True, I've dabbled a bit with Mods

The user below only exists on the internet.

False, I exist as an animal. (Hey, humans are also animals...)

The next user does not exist as a human.

Right, I am the Holy Flying Lasagna Monster. Bow before me before I turn you into Lasagna!

The user below me is using a computer.

If you count an iPad as one, then yes.

The user below me is watching a movie.

False, but I watched one yesterday.

The user below me has read the Outsiders.

Read what?

The user below has already read 50 Shades of Grey.

Nope!

Person below me has endured one of the Twilight films.
